properties.Name: JournalEntry
properties.Description:
The entry of a transaction into the journal or book of original entry.

All transactions are first recorded into a journal in chronological order.

This represents an adequate explanation of what has occurred before the transaction is posted to accounts.

Note:
The transaction may be entered into one or more journals such as a general journal and a specialized journal.

Columns.Name: JournalId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Journal.

Columns.Name: JournalEntryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Journal Entry.

Columns.Name: JournalTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp of the journal entry.

Columns.Name: JournalEntryDescription
Columns.Description: A description of the journal entry/transaction.

Columns.Name: TransactionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Transaction.

Columns.Name: JournalAdjustingEntryTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a journal adjusting entry type.

Columns.Name: ResponsibilityCenterId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Responsibility Center.

Properties.Description:
The entry of a transaction into the journal or book of original entry.

All transactions are first recorded into a journal in chronological order.

This represents an adequate explanation of what has occurred before the transaction is posted to accounts.

Note:
The transaction may be entered into one or more journals such as a general journal and a specialized journal.
